tool_description: Find nutrition facts by food name or by UPC (barcode). API supports multiple languages including English, Russian, Polish, Spanish, Bulgarian, and Ukrainian.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the food item to search for.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Language for searching in the specific food database. It can be detected automatically or set manually from the available options.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The UPC code of the food item to search for.
